text: Thomas "Tom" Atkins (born November 13, 1935) is an American actor. He is known for playing police officers. He has also acted in horror movies. He starred as Dan Challis in Halloween III: Season of the Witch (1982). Atkins was born on November 13, 1935 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.Tom Atkins Biography (1935-) He studied at Duquesne University. Atkins was married to Garn Stephens until they divorced. He has been married to Janice Atkins since 1986. He has one child, Taylor Atkins. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh
title: Tom Atkins
